GSD.description:
HID: roccat: Fix use-after-free in roccat_read()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.220 by commit e30c3a9a88818e5cf3df3fda6ab8388bef3bc6cd. For more details please see the references link.
